pullRequest.title: Remove python dependency by generating crypto keys using java

commit.message: Remove python dependency by generating crypto key using java

nodes.bodyText: Missing new line at the end.

You are missing 128 bits keys, directory.psk for instance. Check all references to KeyStore.checkAndSetKey to find all used keys and their length. The cleanest (and tedious) way would be to have a Map in a similar way Python did.
You should also compile your regexs outside this stream for performance.

commit.message: Explicitly list all keys to look for

Merge pull request #1 from ftence/generateCryptoKeyAllKeys

Explicitly list all keys to look for
